http.title: Home
http.html:
ABOUT US

FAQS

REVIEWS

GET IN TOUCH

0151 236 3201

Situated in Crosby, Liverpool. We have vast experience in supplying the highest quality luxury Virgin Russian hair.

 

Our highly skilled team of wefters make each weft by hand and all of our hair is Virgin Double Drawn. Each weft is 11 inches wide and lengths range from 8-28.

 

Quality hair that lasts... Rachels Hair Company!

  • Firstly 'Virgin Hair' mean that the hair has never been chemically enhanced and is 100% pure and natural.  Our hair is of the highest quality hair and we pride ourselves in supplying the very best money can buy.

  • Our hair is ethically sourced from hair donors that are willing to sell their hair for a nominal fee to hair collectors.

  • No we receive the hair still in the ponytail form.

  • Double Drawn hair means that the hair is thick from root to tip. To achieve Double Drawn wefts we extract the shorter hairs from the ponytail which is costly process.

  • Single Drawn hair consists of longer and shorter hairs within the weft and appears very thin on the ends of the weft.

    This type of hair is a lot cheaper than double drawn.

     

    We do not sell Single Drawn hair.

  • All our wefts are made by hand by our own very skilled team of wig makers.

  • Yes we seal all our wefts with a specialist weft sealant that ensures the weft is secure, watertight and to avoid shredding.

  • Our wefts is a bespoke Handmade product that after a while may need another reseal to ensure the hair is secure. Always ask your hairstylist to check the top of the weft before re tightening your hair.

  • Our wefts are 11 inches wide but we can also customise and width you require.

  • Yes of course our hair can be coloured but please be aware that it's careful process that needs to be done by an experienced Virgin Hair specialist. We have selected salons with vast knowledge of our hair that we only recommend. If you decided to have your hair coloured elsewhere.

     

    We will NOT be held responsible for any damage occurred.

  • Our hair is exactly like your own hair and is 100% natural. We do recommend L'Oréal salon shampoo and conditioner as we have been using this product on our hair for many years. We DO NOT advise using straightening irons on your hair as it will damage your hair the same way it would damage your own hair.

  • Some of our clients purchase virgin hair that matches perfectly to their own colour others made need colour matching to their own unique requirements.

    See question 'Can your hair be coloured?' above.

  • We supply various textures to match clients own natural hair. For example we would not supply a naturally smooth haired client a curly textured weft. Each client is Bespoke.

  • We have lots of clients that have been wearing our hair for many years and take great care not to damage the hair but if the hair is mistreated like your own natural hair it will cause unavoidable damage.

  • Yes, we have Facebook page with lots of testimonials from happy clients.

  • Yes, we do, please contact us for a shipping quote.

  • Yes, we do, please contact us for more information.

Submitting Form...

There was an error with your submission. Please try again.

Thank you for submitting your query. One of our team will be in touch with you shortly.

My hair is an absolute dream i'm so happy. Another plus was the service an the fact my wait wasn't long at all so made up with it thanks girls such excellent service!

 

Lyndsey

I really don't know why all these years I've wasted my money on other hair extensions?! These are an absolute dream to blow dry and being a hairdresser I can tell that the quality is just perfect! And I couldn't thank the girls enough for getting me my hair so fast! I really appreciate it! I would highly recommend Rachel’s to everyone. Thanks girls xxxx

 

Cheryl

How fantastic is Rachel’s Hair Company I have had my hair in for nearly 2 years now and I have just bought 2 new rows to add more length. This is the best Hair place around I wouldn't go anywhere else, and the Customer service is second to none. Thanks Girls always a pleasure xx

 

Adele

This is the second time I have bought Russian wefts from Rachel's Hair Company, the hair is of the best quality, i wouldn’t go anywhere else! The service is excellent  and friendly. Would definitely recommend Rachel's Hair Company to friends xxx

 

Michelle

My hair is 3 years old this year and looks brand new! Best investment ever. Don’t waste time and money replacing fake hair all the time. Work out what you spend a year on what it would cost to buy just once! Ive saved a fortune and always get compliments. And the aftercare is wonderful!

 

Sara

Best hair available on the market.

Had my hair for a few years now & still in fabulous condition.!!

Been back today to spoil myself with more...Love love love Rachel's  x

 

Leanne

Love my new hair, I’ve had loads of hair from lots of different places and this is definitely the best. Even the consultation was so professional, its so hard to find nice hair now a days and I’m made up I’ve found this place. Thank you xx

 

Laura

Adore my hair! Got my first pieces last January an it's still like brand new! Treated myself to a new piece to add in for Xmas an that is also lovely quality! Highly recommend xxx

 

Danielle

Had my hair since February 2015 and still its amazing nearly a year and a half on! best Russian hair I've had and I've been to a few places!

 

Amy

Had my hair almost a year now and it has been coloured and had highlights put through it and it's still as fab as the day I bought it would never go anywhere else.

 

Vicky

Amazing quality hair , hair I’m wearing at the minute is over 18 months old and still fabulous , still got hair from over 4 years ago that's fab still !

Customer for life . Xxx

 

Carly

Been using Rachel's hair for a long time now and it really is the best, always made up with both the service and the hair.

 

Gemma

Helpful, friendly and experts! Thanks for helping me get the fabulous hair. Won't be looking back, totally worth investing in xx

 

Adrienne

I've had my hair for two years and is still like the day I bought it. Wouldn't buy anything else!

 

Carla

Amazing quality hair. I've had it for two years and it's still feels new, not like all others I've had in the past that just go tatty. Would never go anywhere else.

 

Lisa

I have had my hair extension a while now and absolutely love it, definitely going to get myself another one soon wouldn't go anywhere else x

 

Jen

I picked up my beautiful hair yesterday. What a lovely place. Everyone is really lovely. Xxxx

 

Laura

Had my hair 3 years .. And it is still in great condition ! Xx

 

Natalia Bello Amor

Absolutely amazing quality hair... Would highly recommend!! Girls r lovely and really helpful xxx

 

Sachelle

Amazing hair and excellent service!! Thank you so much x x x

 

Emily

0151 236 3201

 

Rachels Hair Company Ltd

 

info@rachelshaircompany.co.uk

 

20 Bridge Road, Crosby, Liverpool. L23 6SG

Company Number 10380212

Recent publications

View all publications

  • Domestic Homicide Review (DHR) Case Analysis

    Report for Standing Together

    Read more

  • Deflection, denial and disbelief: social and political discourses about child sexual abuse and their influence on institutional responses

    A rapid evidence assessment - Summary report

    Read more

  • Measuring the scale and changing nature of child sexual abuse and child sexual exploitation in England and Wales

    New scoping report written by CWASU, working with the Centre of Expertise, has just been published

    Read more

Latest news

View all news

  • 24 Apr 2018

    Contributing to the Independent Inquiry Into Child Sexual Abuse

    London Met’s Child and Woman Abuse Studies Unit has published a report looking into prior historical discussions surrounding child sexual abuse.

  • 13 Dec 2017

    A documentary, The 100 Women Challenge

    A documentary on the 100 Women Challenge featuring Professor Liz Kelly, Director of London Met’s Child and Woman Abuse Studies Unit has been broadcast by the BBC. The half hour documentary explores the concept of safer streets in London where

Feminist self-defence: Victim empowering or victim blaming?

Book now!

Speakers Rahila Gupta, Jan Jordan, Liz Kelly and Fiona Vera-Gray will discuss the revolutionary history of feminist self defence.

MA in Child and Woman Abuse. Short course on Sexual Violence

Study with us

Reflecting the work of CWASU, the MA degree and our short courses focus on what we know about the different forms of abuse.
